All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminService
Service that provides administrative features such as creating admin accounts, removing users, and viewing all registered users.
AuthService
Handles all authentication-related functionality such as logging in, logging out, and verifying whether the current user has the required permissions.
AuthService
Handles authentication concerns (US1.1/US1.2).
Book
Represents a book in the library collection.
BorrowService
Handles the lifecycle of borrowing and returning media.
CatalogService
Provides CRUD-style operations for media.
CD
Represents a music CD in the library collection.
DateProvider
Abstraction around the system clock to simplify testing.
DateProvider.System
Production implementation backed by the system clock.
EmailNotifier
// Simple email notifier that records sent messages for verification.
FakeDateProvider
 
FileMediaRepository
Simple file-based implementation of MediaRepository.
FileUserRepository
Simple file-based implementation of UserRepository.
FineService
Handles fine payments and reporting.
FineStrategyFactory
Provides the correct fine-calculation strategy for each media type.
FineStrategyFactory.Strategy
Represents a calculation strategy for overdue fines.
InMemoryLoanRepository
 
InMemoryMediaRepository
Simple in-memory storage for demo purposes.
InMemoryUserRepository
 
LibraryApplication
Boots the CLI application.
LibraryCli
Console based presentation layer.
LibraryEnvironment
Wiring helper for the layered architecture.
LibraryException
A general-purpose exception used throughout the library system.
LibraryException
Domain specific runtime exception.
LibraryGUI
 
Loan
Represents a loan of a media item by a user.
LoanRepository
 
Media
Base class for all media items in the library (Book, CD).
MediaRepository
 
MediaType
Supported media categories for the library.
OverdueReport
Aggregate summary for overdue loans.
OverdueReport.Item
Item within an overdue report that includes the fine amount per media.
ReminderObserver
//Observer that receives reminder notifications.
ReminderService
Subject side of the observer pattern for overdue reminders.
User
Represents both administrators and members in the library system.
UserRepository
 
UserRole
Types of accounts supported by the system.
UserService
Manages user lifecycle operations.
